com.viaoa.jfc.dnd

Class OATransferable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.dnd.OATransferable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable

    public class OATransferable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable
    Used to allow any OAObject or Hub Collection the ability to support Drag and Drop. OA gui components OATree, OAList, OATable use this to wrap objects that are Dragged or Dropped.

      OATransferable(Hub hub, java.lang.Object obj)
